articles.title: Sixth Session of 12th SPA Held
articles.content:
Sixth Session of 12th SPA Held
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Sixth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present at the session.
					
					 Deputies to the SPA were present there.
					
					 Officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions and those in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and press were present as observers.
					
					 The session decided on agenda items of the session.
					
					1. On Enforcing Universal 12-Year Compulsory Education
					
					2. Organizational Issue
					
					 Deputy Choe Thae Bok made a report "On Enforcing Universal 12-Year Compulsory Education."
					
					 He said that the DPRK government will enforce the universal 12-year compulsory education to drastically improve and strengthen the secondary general education and further consolidate the socialist education system to meet the requirements of the developing revolution and the times. 
					
					 The new educational system is aimed at helping the younger generation round off the secondary general education by teaching them general basic knowledge and basic knowledge of modern technologies in the period of the 12-year systematic education which consists of one-year pre-school education, five-year primary school education, three-year junior middle school education and three-year senior middle school education, reporter noted.
					
					 He referred to the issues arising in successfully enforcing the new education.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education at this significant period when the new century of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea started is the firm determination and will of the WPK to steadfastly carry forward and glorify the idea and cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who devoted their all to the future of the country all their life.
					
					 The enforcement of the new education provided a sure guarantee for putting secondary general education onto a higher stage and effecting an epochal turn in the work to train able revolutionaries in keeping with the requirements for the building of a thriving nation, they noted.
					
					 Ordinance of the SPA of the DPRK "On Enforcing the Universal 12-Year Compulsory Education" was adopted at the session.
					
					 The session discussed organizational issue.
					
					 Hong In Bom, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, were elected members of the SPA Presidium to fill the vacancies.
					
					 Choe Hui Jong was recalled from the post of chairman of the Budget Committee of the SPA and Kwak Pom Gi elected chairman of the budget committee.

articles.title: Ordinance on Enforcing 12-Year Compulsory Education Promulgated
articles.content:
Ordinance on Enforcing 12-Year Compulsory Education Promulgated
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Ordinance of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on enforcing universal 12-year compulsory education was promulgated at the sixth session of the 12th SPA held in Pyongyang Tuesday.
					 According to the ordinance, the DPRK government enforced the compulsory primary education in 1956, compulsory secondary education in 1958 and Korean-style unique universal 9-year compulsory technical education which closely combined secondary general education with basic technical education and education with production in 1967.
					
					 In 1972 the DPRK government introduced the universal 11-year compulsory education, the first of its kind in the world.
					
					 The enforcement of the universal 11-year education was a just measure for raising the level of free compulsory education, improving the contents of education and bringing up the new generations to be able revolutionaries and competent socialist builders intensely loyal to the party, the leader, the country and its people as required by the era and the developing revolution.
					
					 The DPRK is now demonstrating its might as a dignified military power possessed of nuclear deterrent, a country that manufactures and launches satellites. Korean-style CNC technology and flexible production system have been introduced to the different domains of the national economy and a great number of Juche-based and modern heavy and light industrial bases and grand monuments have been built. This is associated with the feats and merits of young scientists and youth who have grown up, receiving the universal 11-year compulsory education.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government are set to enforce the universal 12-year compulsory education reflecting the present requirements for building a prosperous socialist country in all fields now that the requirements for education have risen higher than ever before.
					
					 The enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education is a step reflecting the dear respected Kim Jong Un's noble outlooks on the country, the younger generation and future and it is a great event that demonstrates before the whole world that the DPRK is dynamically advancing toward an educational power and a highly civilized socialist country.
					
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education is the most just and advantageous education for drastically raising the quality of education to meet the requirements for the development of education in the age of knowledge-based economy and the trend of the world and bringing up the younger generation to be Juche-type able revolutionaries possessed of ample secondary general knowledge, modern basic technology and creative ability.
					
					 The SPA of the DPRK discussed the issue of enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education and made a decision.
					
					 According to the decision, the universal 12-year compulsory education shall be enforced in all areas of the DPRK.
					
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education shall be enforced free of charge and all children from 5 to 17 years are obliged to receive this education.
					
					 This education consists of one-year pre-school education and five-year primary schooling, three-year junior middle schooling and three-year senior middle schooling.
					
					 The six-year middle schooling shall be enforced from the 2013-2014 school year, divided into three-year junior middle schooling and three-year senior middle schooling.
					
					 The work for converting the four-year primary schooling to five-year primary schooling shall go through the preparatory phase to be started in the 2014-2015 school year and this shall be finished in 2-3 years.
					
					 Educational system and education of special courses of study shall be decided as separate issues.
					
					 Measures shall be taken to solve the shortage of teachers resulting from the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education, raise their qualifications and improve educational methods.
					
					 State investment in education shall be increased and conditions and environment necessary for the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education be created.
					
					 Administrative guidance and legal control shall be strengthened for the successful enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education.

articles.title: Issues Concerning Enforcement of 12-year Compulsory Education Discussed
articles.content:
Issues Concerning Enforcement of 12-year Compulsory Education Discussed
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Deputy Choe Thae Bok made a report on enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education at the sixth session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK held on Tuesday.
					 According to the report, the DPRK government will enforce the universal 12-year compulsory education to drastically improve and strengthen the secondary general education and further consolidate the socialist education system to meet the requirements of the developing revolution and the times.
					
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education represents the development of the universal 11-year compulsory education that has been enforced by the DPRK government, and a new higher stage of the secondary general education.
					
					 The new education system is aimed at helping the younger generation round off the secondary general education by teaching them general basic knowledge and basic knowledge of modern technologies in the period of the 12-year systematic education which consists of one-year pre-school education, five-year primary school education, three-year junior middle school education and three-year senior middle school education.
					
					 The reporter said that the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education is a huge task to be carried out as a nationwide movement with the involvement of whole society. He elaborated on it.
					
					 The order and phases for the enforcement of the system shall be fixed properly and be thoroughly carried out, he said.
					
					 An important task for enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education is to properly shape the educational contents and improve the methods of education, he added.
					
					 He called for stepping up the work for improving the curricula which constitute a basis in arranging the educational contents, and confirming the general goal of the secondary general education, goals of  the courses of study and the scope and level of educational contents. He also underscored the need to write and publish necessary textbooks at an early date.
					
					 He also underlined the need to strengthen education in computer technology and foreign languages with a main emphasis on the education in general basic knowledge in the field of basic sciences including mathematics, physics, chemistry and biology.
					
					 He also called for kicking off an intensive drive for creating new and substantial educational methods and generalizing them as well as actively introducing test methods for correctly assessing the abilities of students.
					
					 All the schools should carry out the positive drive to put the teaching, experiments and practical training on an IT basis, computerize the educational administration and management and establish information communications network between the education committee and educational institutions across the country so that teachers and students can receive information necessary for the education in time, the reporter noted.
					
					 He also called for successfully building up in a substantial way the ranks of teachers who are directly responsible for education and drastically raising their levels and roles.
					
					 Increased state investment in the educational field and provision of educational conditions are a sure guarantee for the successful enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education, he said, and continued:
					
					 The expenditure for education should be markedly increased in the state budget, and electricity, equipment and materials needed for education be provided on a preferential basis.
					
					 The role of organizations patronizing schools should be raised and the officials of all units including provincial, city and county people's committees should pay deep attention to the education and push forward the work for the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education in close combination with the model education county movement.
					
					 Educational and scientific research institutions should strengthen study for raising the quality of the universal 12-year compulsory education on the basis of a correct review and analysis of the present state of education of the country and the worldwide education trend. They should analyze and systematize scientifically and theoretically the new and advanced teaching methods and experience created in practice and generalize them.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need to step up the work for successfully enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education true to the noble intention of the dear respected Kim Jong Un manifested in his ardent love for the younger generation and the future.

articles.title: Educators in DPRK Inspired by SPA Ordinance
articles.content:
Educators in DPRK Inspired by SPA Ordinance
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- An ordinance of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education was promulgated at the Sixth Session of the 12th SPA held here on Tuesday.
					 In this regard, KCNA met professors at Kim Hyong Jik University of Education.
					
					 Pak Chang Hak, vice-president of the university, said:
					
					 "The Sixth Session of the 12th SPA, which was held today with the dear respected Kim Jong Un in attendance, adopted an ordinance on enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education in the country. This is a great event of weight significance in the history of development of the Juche-based education.
					
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education is the most reasonable and best one as it helps radically improve the quality of education, as required by the era of knowledge-based economy and the world tendency, and thus train the rising generations to be talents of Juche type equipped with perfect secondary general knowledge and modern basic technological knowledge as well as creative ability.
					
					 The ordinance makes it possible to further improve the country's socialist education system, provided by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, in keeping with the developing situation.
					
					 It reflects the noble intention and will of the dear respected Kim Jong Un to build most civilized and developed, thriving socialist country by dint of education and knowledge with the noble outlook on posterity."
					
					  Yun Tong Il, a faculty dean of the university, said:
					
					 "Each country is paying deep attention to educational work in the present era, the era of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 We, educators, are faced with an honorable task to train the younger generations to be masters of a civilized socialist country and dependable pillars of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea proudly advancing forward.
					
					 Cherishing Kim Jong Un's deep trust in educators, we will do our best to produce more talents who will bring a great turn in the nation's education."

articles.title: State Academy of Sciences Delegation Cames Back Bome
articles.content:
State Academy of Sciences Delegation Cames Back Bome
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Academy of Sciences led by Vice-President Ri Chol Jin came back home Tuesday after taking part in the 12th World Conference of Academies of Sciences of Developing Countries held in China. 
					 The delegation of the Workers' Party of Turkey headed by Dasar Karadag, member of the Political Bureau of its Central Committee, departed here on the same day.

articles.title: WHO Official Visits Hospitals
articles.content:
WHO Official Visits Hospitals
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Samlee Plianbangchang, director of the Regional Office for South-East Asia of the World Health Organization, and his party visited Kim Man Yu Hospital Tuesday.
					 They went to the online medical service room of the hospital before being briefed on the diagnosis of patients and medical care for them through online video negotiations by computer networks between hospitals in Pyongyang and local areas. 
					
					 They also visited Hospital No. 3 under the Ministry of Public Health, the Taedonggang District People's Hospital, etc.

articles.title: Joint Scientific Conference Closes
articles.content:
Joint Scientific Conference Closes
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Joint scientific conference of Kim Il Sung University and the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet closed.
					 A closing ceremony took place at Kim Il Sung University on Tuesday.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were teachers and researchers of the university including Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, and prominent scholars who are members of the delegation of the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet led by Vice-Chairman Wolf-Dieter Rausch.
					
					 Kim Kyun, first vice-president of Kim Il Sung University, informed the participants of the achievements made in the biomedical and biotechnological fields including the animal veterinary and husbandry science and recalled that valuable papers conducive to the promotion of people's wellbeing were presented at the conference.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung University would boost academic exchange with universities in the world affiliated with the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet in the future, too.
					
					 At the closing ceremony a letter of thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted.
					
					 There were panel discussions prior to the ceremony.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University hosted a reception for the participants in the joint scientific conference at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday.

articles.title: Letter of Thanks from Joint Scientific Conference Participants
articles.content:
Letter of Thanks from Joint Scientific Conference Participants
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Tuesday received a letter of thanks from the participants in the joint scientific conference of Kim Il Sung University and the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The conference held at Kim Il Sung University on the theme of "Biomedical and Biotechnological Progress for a Healthy Society" was a significant meeting which took place against the backdrop of ever-growing desire of mankind for the promotion of well-being and its increasing efforts for it.
					
					 It is of great significance to boost friendship and solidarity with the Korean people who have made sustained efforts to provide highly civilized living conditions and multi-faceted cooperation and exchange with them in the fields of education and science and technology.
					
					 We will further develop the cooperation and exchange in the fields of education and science and technology on the basis of the successes made at the conference and make a positive contribution to the promotion of the people's well-being and improvement of the people's living standard in the DPRK.
					
					 Rosy is the prospect of building a thriving nation and improving the people's living standard in the DPRK as it is led by you thoroughly embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism under the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thanks to the diligent and resourceful Korean people.
					
					 For the DPRK's progress and prosperity in education, science and technology and the friendly cooperation and exchange in the fields of education and science between Austria and the DPRK and between the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet and Kim Il Sung University, we sincerely wish Your Excellency good health.

articles.title: Foreign Scholars Satisfied with Results of Joint Scientific Conference
articles.content:
Foreign Scholars Satisfied with Results of Joint Scientific Conference
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A joint scientific conference of Eurasia-Pacific Uninet and Kim Il Sung University was closed on Tuesday.
					In this regard, KCNA met participants in the conference.
					
					 Wolf-Dieter Rausch from University of Veterinary Medicine Vienna, Austria, who is heading the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet delegation, said he could know through the conference that respected Marshal Kim Jong Un gives priority to science and technology. Austrian scholars hope to have the scientific conference with Kim Il Sung University on an expanded basis, he added.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 The conference was successful and DPRK scientists speak foreign languages well.
					
					 E-library of Kim Il Sung University is furnished with up-to-date facilities.
					
					 I will deepen cooperation and exchange with the DPRK in science and technology.
					
					 Franz Rubel and Katharina Brugger from University of Veterinary Medicine Vienna said that the conference was very interesting, expressing their will to attend such conference to be held in Pyongyang in the future. 
					
					 Noting that the e-library in the university, the venue of the conference, has all conditions to fully ensure the academic exchanges, they said that visit to Pyongyang is very impressive and the city is very beautiful with kindhearted citizens and many stylish buildings.
					
					 Buyantogtokh Choijilsuren from National University of Mongolia said that she was satisfied with the results of the conference.
					
					 Educational conditions are splendid in the university, she said, adding:
					
					 I have to say that the DPRK people can create more splendid ones.
					
					 Back home, I will introduce to Mongolians the DPRK and its scientific and technological level.

articles.title: National Mass Consumption Goods Exhibition Held
articles.content:
National Consumer Goods Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A national consumer goods exhibition took place here from Sept. 19 to 25.
					 Displayed there were more than 36 000 goods of hundreds of kinds presented by ministries, national institutions and factories and enterprises under the provincial bureaus for the management of foodstuff and daily necessities industry.
					
					 Drawing the attention of visitors were quality and well-designed shoes, textile and knitwear as well as foodstuffs conducive to improving the people's diet.
					
					 During the period of the exhibition, there were competitive show, dissemination of new technologies and registration of goods.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Draws with French Rival
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Draws with French Rival
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team drew with its French rival 1:1 in the 2012 U-17 Women's World Cup on Tuesday. 
					 The DPRK team will have the third match with its U.S. rival on Sept. 29.

articles.title: 8th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair
articles.content:
8th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The 8th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair opened on Monday.
					 Attending the fair are more than 210 companies and entities from 10 odd countries and regions, including the DPRK, China, Netherlands and Germany.
					
					 O Il Hun, deputy director of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, told KCNA:
					
					 "The current fair features many high-end products.
					
					 The Ryonha Machinery Company exhibits the vertical machining centre (RV-25A), lathe (RT-210), voltage regulator (RCVF-85KVA) and CNC-based cutting tools, which are popular in foreign markets."
					
					 Pak Se Chol, an official of the Korean Computer Center, said:
					
					 "The centre is participating in the fair with varieties of IT products, including the updated PAD. The PAD contains multi-language dictionary, IT terminology dictionary as well as textbooks and reference books for secondary and primary schoolers."
					
					 Meanwhile, the Industrial Technology Company presented an energy-saving electric boiler and the Hana Electronic Joint Venture Company a new type of pocket DVD player.
					
					 Among the exhibitors are also the Korean Sungri Economic Trading Corporation, Hi-tech Development Office, Phyongjin Bicycle Joint Venture Company and Saebyol Technology Exchange Office.
					
					 The Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair helps invigorate trade, joint venture, collaboration, investment and exchange of science and technologies among countries.
					
					 The fair will run until September 27.

articles.title: Popular DPRK-Britain Co-produced Film
articles.content:
Popular DPRK-Britain Co-produced Film
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- "Comrade Kim Goes Flying", a DPRK-Britain co-produced feature film, is enjoying popularity in the ongoing 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival.
					 The film tells about a story that a Korean girl working at a coal mine becomes a fancy flier as she hoped. The heroine of the film is Han Jong Sim, a Korean acrobat.
					
					 The movie, co-produced by DPRK, British and Belgian directors and producers, won popularity at the International Film Festival held in Toronto of Canada some time ago.
					
					 The film was screened at the Pyongyang International Cinema House on Monday.
					
					 Before its show, the British film producer, Nicholas Bonner, told KCNA that the seed of the film is "Follow your dreams".
					
					Bonner, also head of Koryo Group in China, said that he has been in the DPRK, doing tourism and film projects for 20 years. Noting he made three documentaries, but wanted to make a film and likes the universal story of "Follow your dreams" and "Believing yourself", he said that he cooperated with a Belgian expert and amazing producers and actors and actresses from the DPRK in making a film script and directing and shooting the film. It was a wonderful cooperation, he added.
					
					 "I have been watching Korean films for 20 years and my first Korean film was the 'Flower Girl'", he said, expressing his will to further strengthen cooperation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Co-op Farm Well-known for Stockbreeding
articles.content:
Co-op Farm Well-known for Stockbreeding
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Kubin Stockbreeding Cooperative Farm in Kangdong County, Pyongyang, is well known throughout the country for stockbreeding.
					 More than 80 percent of the farm's area is forests and thousands of goats and hundreds of milch cows are bred there.
					
					 The farm turns out kefir, butter, cheese and processed meat and its peasants largely benefit from stockbreeding.
					
					 Over the last 10 odd years the farm has introduced good breeds of animals, up-to-date farm machines and the rotation production system between stockbreeding and agricultural production.
					
					 After all, milk production increased 74.6 times, meat 12.6 times and grain 1.5 times compared with the year 1996.
					
					 The number of technicians in the farm at present is 12 times the figure in 2009.

articles.title: Bioindustry Institute Conducive to Improvement of Health
articles.content:
Bioindustry Institute Conducive to Improvement of Health
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Bioindustry Institute under Kim Il Sung University is contributing to the improvement of people's health and the development of the nation's core technologies.
					 After coming into being in December Juche 78 (1989), the Institute has made a lots of successes in the development of bioindustrial products and the technological service.
					
					 It developed tens of kinds of medicines and health food, including "Chonggokkinase", "Bone-strengthening protein" and "Glutamic acid zinc", helping mass-produce them on an industrial basis.
					
					 It also made a big contribution to environmental protection and promotion of people's livelihood by introducing such new ultra-modern scientific and technological successes as the improvement of water quality by nitrite bacterium and the production of medicine for diseases of fish by high-concentrated bacteriophage.
					
					 The Institute boasts of more than 20 competent scientists holding honorary titles and academic degrees or titles.
					
					 Director Ri Hyon Gwang told KCNA that the Institute is now concentrating its efforts on the work to develop more functional bio-products and steadily improve the production and quality control system of health food and biomedicines.

articles.title: Vine Palm to Be Massively Propagated in DPRK
articles.content:
Vine Palm to Be Massively Propagated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The institute under the Central Botanical Garden succeeded in massively propagating vine palm.
					 Vine palm is an ornamental plant growing in the tropics and subtropics. Its artificial propagation had been believed to be difficult.
					
					 The biologists of the institute made the plant flower by injecting growth accelerant and bear fruits by artificial fertilization, paving a way for massively propagating the plant.
					
					 The low-costing method of seed propagation has already been applied to greenhouses in the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are faced with a sacred duty to decisively eliminate outside forces for aggression and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which poses a serious threat to the destiny of the nation by currying favor with them and achieve the country's reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 National reunification was the lifetime desire of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and is the greatest national historic task of the present generation.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are the eternal sun of the nation and the lodestar of the country's reunification who worked heart and soul till the last moments of their lives to hand over the reunified country to the fellow countrymen, taking to heart the national split more than any others.
					
					 It was the President who said with deep emotion that the country's reunification was the best gift he would like to present to the Koreans. And it was Kim Jong Il who put forth the famous aphorism that the struggle for the country's reunification was the greatest patriotic struggle for the Korean nation, arousing patriotism among its members.
					
					 It is the supreme national task and sacred patriotic cause whose solution brooks no further delay to realize their last instructions for the country's reunification and their noble desire for it.
					
					 If the Koreans fail to reunify the country in the present generation, this burden will come down on the shoulders of the next generation. 
					
					 The country's reunification is the greatest national task to be fulfilled by the present generation.
					
					 It is national disgrace that the Koreans are still undergoing the national tragedy and sufferings resulting from the territorial division caused by foreign forces and the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Lee group to escalate the confrontation and ignite a war.
					
					 Those who have the blood and soul of the Koreans should turn out as one in the patriotic struggle to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and realize their cherished desire, no matter where and what they do.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Trumpeting about "Unification Jar" Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Trumpeting about "Unification Jar" Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification staged a strange farce called "land-crossing long journey for unification jar". Minions of the ministry and some bribed riff-raffs involved in this farce make a bike tour of various cities of south Korea from Taejon to Seoul and Phaju to advertise "preparations for unification." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such farce staged by the Lee Myung Bak group is nothing but an anti-reunification racket under the signboard of "preparations for unification" and moves for a war of aggression against the north.
					
					 This is no more than a poor ruckus for confrontation to cover up their despicable colors as separatists with the word of "unification" and incite the atmosphere of confrontation with fellow countrymen in a bid to realize their ambition for achieving "unification of the social  systems" at any cost.
					
					 Koreans have failed to achieve reunification not for the lack of money. The burning aspiration and enthusiasm of the Korean nation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity can hardly be compared with any amount of gold.
					
					 If the Koreans pool their efforts and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, they can produce anything and settle any issue.
					
					 Can the Lee group win people's mindset by talking about the threadbare unification jar? It is by no means fortuitous that the "Saenuri Party" pinning hope on the bubble-like "logic of the trend" is taking a bitter taste due to the sinking support rate.
					
					 The Lee group should bear mind that if it persists in the confrontation of the social systems, going against the trend of the times, it will not be able to escape a miserable end.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Brigandish Claim to Tok Islets under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Brigandish Claim to Tok Islets under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- 34 members of the Shimane Prefectural Assembly of Japan at a recent regular prefectural assembly meeting passed a resolution which calls upon the government to set up a department specializing in the issue of Tok Islets at an early date, institute the "Day of Takeshima" and thoroughly enforce education related to "Takeshima" among students.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates that the moves of the Japanese reactionaries to grab Tok Islets have reached a more reckless phase.
					
					 Tok Islets are part of the inviolable territory of Korea and have never belonged to Japan, the commentary says, laying bare the brigandish aims sought by the Japanese reactionaries through their claim to Tok Islets. It goes on:
					
					 They are now raising the claim to Tok Islets not because the sovereignty of their territory is being encroached upon by anyone but because they seek to put into practice their long-pursued policy for territorial expansion.
					
					 It is their political aim to arm the Japanese with the militarist idea of overseas aggression and hurl them into a war for reinvasion. As the first step for their overseas aggression they singled out Tok Islets as a springboard for it as they are the first gate to invasion of the Asian continent. They are working hard to start a war of overseas aggression through seizure of Tok Islets and lead it to the aggression against the whole of the continent.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK can never pardon the Japanese reactionaries to threaten the peace and security of Asia and violate the sovereignty of the Korean nation.
					
					 Tok Islets will remain the territory of the Korean nation forever.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Redeem Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
odong Sinmun Urges Japan to Redeem Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- If Japan is to improve its relations with the DPRK, it should redeem, to begin with, its past crimes committed against the Korean people.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 Japanese politicians are working hard to mislead the public opinion by claiming that "a fundamental problem" should be settled if dialogue between two countries is to make progress, and the DPRK is to blame for the failure to repair the bilateral relations.
					
					 Their assertion is a brigandish logic as it makes profound confusing of justice and injustice, the article notes, bringing to light the past crimes of Japan.
					
					 It is publicly recognized by history that Japan occupied sovereign state Korea by force of arms and in a brigandish manner and enforced an unprecedentedly cruel colonial rule over it. During its rule Japan committed innumerable crimes unprecedented in human history and it inflicted upon the Koreans too many spiritual and moral sufferings and human and material losses to describe. 
					
					 Japan took away or kidnapped more than 8.4 million Koreans to use them as cannon fodder for its wars of aggression and forced them to toil and moil at the slave work sites.
					
					 At least one million Koreans were brutally killed and 200 000 Korean women were forced into sexual slavery, inflicting disgrace and death upon them.
					
					 It is human ethics and morality and a legal requirement and practice for a guilty man to apologize for his wrong. 
					
					 Japan, however, has not admitted any of its past crimes but evaded an apology and reparation for them.
					
					 There are on the earth not a few countries and nations that did wrongs intentionally or unintentionally.
					
					 But Japan is the only country that persistently evades the repentance and apology for its past crimes.
					
					 Japan should liquidate its past crimes as soon as possible. This is necessary for its own sake.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering Up Self-Defence Capability
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering Up Self-Defence Capability
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's capability for self-defence serves as a treasured sword for preventing a war in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia and reliably ensuring peace and security there.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S., the world's biggest possessor of nuclear weapons, has worked hard to swallow up the DPRK. This compelled the latter to have access to nuclear weapons to cope with this threat.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with its A-bombs.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has diverse strategies and tactics for coping with any battle and surprise war of aggression and is fully prepared spiritually and physically. It has not only every means of attack and defence capable of beating back aggression of any formidable enemy but capability for merciless strike. This is the military and technological features of the KPA and the advantages of the DPRK's capability for self-defence.
					
					 If a war breaks out in the peninsula, it will certainly spill over to Asia and different parts of the world and develop into even a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists dared not ignite another war in the peninsula because the DPRK has bolstered up its capability for self-defence while resolutely standing up against their reckless moves for aggression.
					
					 To prevent a war and ensure peace in the peninsula is a key link in the chain efforts for ensuring peace in Asia and the rest of the world. If an atmosphere of peace prevails in the peninsula, it will help make Asia and the rest of the world stable.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will as always defend their socialism and creditably ensure peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia with their capability for self-defence.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lambastes Construction of Jeju Naval Base
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lambastes Construction of Jeju Naval Base
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is stepping up the construction of a naval base on Jeju Island.
					 The regime is contemplating turning Jeju Island into a large naval base capable of simultaneously ensuring the anchorage of more than 20 Aegis destroyers, each of 7 000 ton class, and even the entry and departure of nuclear carriers till 2015.
					
					 This is a grave criminal move to push the military tension and danger of a nuclear war prevailing in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia to an extreme phase, zealously pursuant to the U.S. imperialists' strategy to dominate the world.
					
					 The naval base on Jeju Island is a bridgehead and nuclear outpost for implementing the U.S. strategy of attaching importance to the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. has long kept its eyes on Jeju Island in a bid to build a new overseas military stronghold there.
					
					 Jeju Island just 500km away from Shanghai, China, as the crow flies, is regarded as a strategic fortress capable of controlling and blockading different waterways in the Asia-Pacific region. The U.S. has zealously egged the south Korean puppet regime on to build a naval base on the island with the calculation that if it puts the island under its control, it will be possible to further escalate the military and economic pressure upon the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The construction of the naval base started in 1995 but it had long been put off due to the protest of south Koreans. It has made rapid progress since the Lee group came to power.
					
					 The U.S. pressurized the puppet regime to undertake all aspects of construction project including design and construction in such a way as to turn the naval base into a full-fledged base for nuclear carriers. By doing so, it brought to bolder relief its black-hearted intention to make Jeju Island a center for carrying out its strategy to dominate Asia.
					
					 It, at the same time, selected the naval base construction as a link in the chain efforts to build a missile shield linking Phyongthaek, Inchon, Kunsan and Kwangju, thus putting into practice its military blackmail against the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The group of traitors seeks to turn the island into a maritime strategic fortress just like the U.S. naval bases in Hawaii and Guam, pursuant to its policy. This scenario is aimed at expanding its operational radius toward open sea while escalating the military threat to the DPRK.
					
					 The Jeju Island naval base construction is nothing but a product of collusion between the U.S. keen to realize its strategy for dominating the world and the puppet regime hell-bent on the moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen with the backing of the U.S., their master.
					
					 The regime asserted that the base is "a combined base for civilian and military ships" and "a fresh driving force for growth." But when it was disclosed that the project was premised on ensuring the entry and departure of nuclear carriers, it said that the naval base construction was aimed to swim with the "trend of making ships large-sized." This is nothing but sophism intended to cover up its sinister aims.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the military tension and the danger of a nuclear war will further escalate in the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia in case a large naval base allowing the entry and departure of U.S. nuclear carriers is built on Jeju Island.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. is an arch criminal wantonly threatening the peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific region and the puppet regime is the top-class pro-U.S. stooge unprecedented in history and a nuclear-war servant.
					
					 Intolerable are the regime's moves to turn Jeju Island into a nuclear outpost for the U.S.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will counter with merciless self-defence measures the last-ditch efforts of Lee Myung Bak and the "Saenuri Party" to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the nation in league with outside forces.

articles.title: S. Korea Sentences Member of Pomminryon South to Penal Servitude
articles.content:
S. Korea Sentences Member of Pomminryon South to Penal Servitude
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Chunchon District Court of south Korea held a trial on an appeal against a member of the South Headquarters of the National Alliance for Korea's Reunification on Sept. 23 and declared him guilty by invoking the notorious "Security Law", according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The court sentenced him to one-year in prison, one-year suspension of qualification and two-year stay of execution, charging that he kept the "Path of the Nation", the organ of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, and produced and disseminated the "enemy-benefiting" articles the keynote of which is to encourage and praise the north including its "successful launch of 'Kwangmyongsong-2'".

articles.title: Officials of S. Korean Organizations Call for Reconciliation, Cooperation
articles.content:
Officials of S. Korean Organizations Call for Reconciliation, Cooperation
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Officials of civic and social organizations in south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Sept. 20. They called for realizing the reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south of Korea in order to achieve peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Speakers at the meeting called upon the south and the north of Korea to achieve reconciliation and cooperation through dialogue in order to terminate the division and realize the peace and reunification of the peninsula.
					
					 They would put forth the improvement of the relations between the south and the north of Korea, the conclusion of a peace agreement on the peninsula, the cancellation of the Jeju naval base construction, the opposition to anti-DPRK confrontation racket and crackdown under pretence of public security and the reduction of military expenditure as essential tasks for achieving peace and reunification, they said, adding they would stage actions to fulfill them.

articles.title: Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in South Africa
articles.content:
Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in South Africa
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A group for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism was formed with due ceremony in Johannesburg on Sept. 18.
					 Present there were teachers and students of Witwatersrand University.
					
					 A professor of the university explained the essential contents, features and position of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the advantages of Korean-style socialism guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 The group will deeply study and disseminate Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and make a positive contribution to the progress and prosperity of South Africa and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence, he noted.
					
					 The professor was elected the chairman of the group at the meeting.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Lauded by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Lauded by Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru issued bulletin on Sept. 19 to commemorate the 63rd anniversary of the death of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin carried an article illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk, the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The article said Kim Jong Suk protected Kim Il Sung's safety and revolutionary idea politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life in the whole period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Her greatest exploit was that she gave birth to Kim Jong Il as a shining star over Mt. Paektu, providing a sure guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the article said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk will always be remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives as a mother of the Songun revolution for the noble example she set in devotedly defending the leader and the undying exploits she performed for the freedom and liberation of Korea.

articles.title: Lecture Given by Beninese Figure on DPRK
articles.content:
Lecture Given by Beninese Figure on DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin gave a lecture in Cotonou  on Sep. 18 after visiting the DPRK.
					 Present there were members of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin and other people.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme said he saw a rosy future of Songun Korea while staying in the DPRK.
					
					 He said the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is energetically working for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun which was pioneered and advanced by the preceding leaders, steering the drive for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Visiting the Museum of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, Rungna People's Pleasure Park, etc., I clearly realized what a high level the might of the DPRK has reached, he noted, and continued:
					
					 I was envious of Koreans who are full of pride and self-esteem toward their country.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of the preceding leaders as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the Korean people will advance straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he noted.
					
					 He said that the Korean people would surely build an invincible thriving nation based on the Juche idea in the near future.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried on Nepalese Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried on Nepalese Paper
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was carried by the Nepalese paper Arpan on Sept. 21.
					 The work made public on April 20, 2012 says the 100-year history of Juche Korea is the most sacred and glorious history that shines with the august names of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their undying revolutionary exploits.
					
					 It also indicates tasks for successfully carrying forward generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche bequeathed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Japan Has Never Made Effort to Reflect on Its Past: GermanPaper
articles.content:
Japan Has Never Made Effort to Reflect on Its Past: GermanPaper
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Japan has never made any effort to face up to its wartime crimes, which may be the real reason behind its repeated rows with neighbors, German daily Sueddeutsche Zeitung said in an article on Sept. 19.
					 The article said Japan has never made any effort to come to terms with its wartime past, either denying the atrocities or downplaying them with empty phrases such as "it was just war."
					
					 "In Japan no one has ever had to take responsibilities for all these acts. From Japan's view there is no stain in the history," it said.

articles.title: Efectuado 6o periodo de sesiones de XII Legislatura de APS
articles.content:
Efectuado 6o periodo de sesiones de XII Legislatura de APS
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae el sexto periodo de sesiones de XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Estuvo presente Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Asistieron los diputados a la APS.
					
					En calidad de observadores, participaron los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios, instituciones centrales y de los sectores de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion.
					
					Quedaron aprobados los puntos de la agenda del sexto periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la APS.
					
					1. Sobre la implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					
					2. El asunto de organizacion.
					
					El diputado Choe Thae Bok presento el informe "Sobre la implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos".
					
					El informante dijo que el gobierno de la RPDC llevara a cabo la mencionada educacion para mejorar e intensificar decisivamente la ensenanza general secundaria conforme a los requisitos de la revolucion en desarrollo y la epoca, consolidar y desarrollar mas el sistema de educacion socialista de la RPDC.
					
					La nueva ensenanza obligatoria permite perfeccionar la educacion general secundaria a las nuevas generaciones al ensenarles los conocimientos basicos generales y los otros de tecnologias basicas contemporaneas durante el periodo de educacion sistematica de 12 anos: un ano para la ensenanza preescolar; 5 anos para la primaria; 3 anos para la secundaria basica y 3 anos para la secundaria superior.
					
					Destaco los asuntos para aplicar con exito la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					
					Acto seguido hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores recalcaron que la implantacion de nueva ensenanza obligatoria en el tiempo significado de dar inicio a la nueva centuria de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il deviene la firme decision y voluntad del PTC de continuar invariablemente y glorificar la idea y la causa de los grandes Generalisimos que habian dedicado todos los suyos para el futuro de la patria.
					
					Al aplicarse en la RPDC la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos, fue preparada la firme garantia para poner en una nueva etapa mas alta la ensenanza general secundaria conforme a la demanda de la construccion de un Estado prospero y producir un viraje trascendental en la labor para formar a las personas competentes de la revolucion, acotaron.
					
					Quedo adoptada la ley de la APS de la RPDC "Sobre la implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos".
					
					Se debatio el asunto de organizacion.
					
					Como miembros del Presidium de la APS fueron electos suplementariamente Hong In Bom, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y Jon Yong Nam, presidente del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					
					Choe Hui Jong fue destituido del cargo del presidente de la Comision del Presupuesto de la APS y Kwak Pom Gi fue electo como nuevo presidente de dicha comision.

articles.title: Publicada ley de implantacion de ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos
articles.content:
Publicada ley de implantacion de ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo publicada en el sexto periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, efectuado el dia 25 en esta capital, la ley de implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					Segun ella, el gobierno de la RPDC practico en 1956 la ensenanza primaria obligatoria, en 1958 la ensenanza secundaria obligatoria y en 1967, la autoctona ensenanza tecnica obligatoria general de 9 anos al estilo coreano que posibilito combinar estrechamente la ensenanza secundaria general con la educacion tecnica basica y la educacion con el trabajo productivo.
					
					Y en 1972 aplico por primera vez en el mundo la ensenanza obligatoria general de 11 anos.
					
					Esto fue una justa medida para elevar el nivel de la ensenanza obligatoria gratuita conforme a las exigencias de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo, renovar los contenidos didacticos y formar a las nuevas generaciones como competentes revolucionarios y constructores socialistas infinitamente fieles al partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					Gracias a las proezas y contribuciones de los cientificos y jovenes de nueva generacion, quienes han crecido bajo el sistema de la educacion obligatoria general de 11 anos, se ha convertido la RPDC en la prestigiosa potencia militar con el disuasivo nuclear y pais fabricante y lanzador de satelites artificiales, se han introducido en varios dominios de la economia nacional la tecnologia CNC al estilo coreano y el sistema de produccion flexible y se han levantado las autoctonas y modernas bases de las industrias pesada y ligera y muchas creaciones monumentales.
					
					Dado que se aumentan incomparablemente las exigencias sobre la educacion, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC ponen en practica la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos reflejando la demanda actual de la construccion general del Estado prospero socialista.
					
					La aplicacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos es una medida importante que sintetiza las nobles concepciones de la patria, de las generaciones venideras y del futuro del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y es un acontecimiento que muestra a todo el mundo que la RPDC avanza a pasos firmes hacia la potencia docente y pais socialista desarrollado y civilizado.
					
					La ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos constituye la mas justa y ventajosa que posibilita elevar decisivamente la calidad de la ensenanza de acuerdo con la tendencia mundial y las exigencias de la educacion en desarrollo en la era de economia basada en la intelectualidad y formar a las nuevas generaciones como competentes revolucionarios de tipo jucheano dotados de ricos conocimientos de nivel medio, de modernos conocimientos tecnicos basicos y de capacidad creativa. 
					
					La APS de la RPDC anuncio que debatio y aprobo el problema de poner en practica la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					
					Segun la resolucion, se aplicara en todas las localidades del pais la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					
					La ensenanza se practicara gratis para todos los ninos y jovenes de 5 a 17 anos de edad.
					
					La ensenanza se divide en la preescolar de un ano, la primaria de 5 anos, la secundaria basica de 3 anos y la secundaria superior de 3 anos.
					
					Desde el curso escolar 2013-2014, la escuela secundaria de 6 anos se gestionara dividida en la secundaria basica de 3 anos y la secundaria superior de 3 anos.
					
					La conversion de la escuela primaria de 4 anos en la de 5 anos empezara desde el curso escolar de 2014-2015 despues de pasar la etapa de preparativos necesarios y se culminara en 2-3 anos.
					
					Se determinara excepcionalmente el sistema escolar y la educacion de especiales tipos de escuelas. 
					
					Se tomaran las medidas para reforzar los insuficientes maestros, elevar sus capacidades y mejorar los metodos didacticos. 
					
					Se aumentaran las inversiones estatales a la rama y se prepararan las condiciones y el ambiente necesarios a la aplicacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					
					Se intensificaran la direccion administrativa y el control juridico para practicar exitosamente la ensenanza.

articles.title: Informe sobre implantacion de ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos
articles.content:
Informe sobre implantacion de ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En el sexto periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que tuvo lugar este martes, el diputado Choe Thae Bok presento el informe sobre la implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					Segun el informe, el gobierno de la RPDC aplicara la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos para mejorar decisivamente la educacion media general conforme a las exigencias de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo y consolidar aun mas el sistema de educacion socialista del pais.
					
					La ensenanza mencionada desarrolla la ensenanza obligatoria general de 11 anos practicada por el gobierno de la RPDC y deviene nueva etapa elevada del sistema de la ensenanza media general.
					
					La ensenanza sistematica gratuita de 12 anos, que abarca la educacion preescolar de un ano, la primaria de 5 anos, la secundaria basica de 3 anos y la secundaria superior de 3 anos, perfeccionara la educacion media general para las nuevas generaciones dandoles los conocimientos generales basicos y los tecnicos basicos modernos.
					
					La implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos es la inmensa labor de todo el  Estado y toda la sociedad.
					
					Hay que fijar correctamente y cumplir estrictamente el orden y las etapas de la labor.
					
					La importante tarea para el respecto es componer bien los contenidos de educacion y mejorar los metodos didacticos. 
					
					Deben completar con rapidez los programas de educacion, que sirven de bases en la composicion de los contenidos didacticos, fijar la meta final de la educacion media general, la meta de alcance por tipos de escuelas, los limites y el nivel de los contenidos de educacion y redactar y editar lo mas pronto posible los manuales. 
					
					Deben dar importancia a ofrecer a los alumnos los conocimientos  generales basicos de la matematica, la fisica, la quimica, la biologia y otras ramas de las ciencias basicas e intensificar la educacion de tecnologia de computacion y la de lenguas extranjeras. 
					
					Es necesario librar una campana para eliminar el metodo de ensenanza manualista y memorista y crear y generalizar otros metodos novedosos y frescos y buscar e introducir los metodos de examen capaces de evaluar correctamente la capacidad de los alumnos.
					
					Todas las escuelas deben dinamizar la labor para informatizar la educacion y las experiencias, computarizar la administracion docente y formar el network entre la Comite de Educacion y las instituciones docentes de todo pais para que los funcionarios docentes y los alumnos puedan obtener a tiempo las informaciones necesarias a la labor docente. 
					
					Es preciso fortalecer las filas de los maestros, responsables directos de la educacion, y elevar decisivamente el nivel y el papel de ellos mismos. 
					
					Aumentar las inversiones estatales sobre la rama y asegurar las condiciones de educacion es una importante garantia para aplicar exitosamente la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					
					Han de aumentar decisivamente los egresos de fondos para la educacion en el presupuesto estatal y asegurar con prioridad la electricidad, los equipos y los materiales necesarios a la educacion. 
					
					Hay que elevar el papel de las entidades de apoyo a las escuelas. Y los funcionarios de todas las unidades incluso los comites populares provinciales, urbanos y distritales deben prestar profunda atencion a la labor docente e impulsar activamente la implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos en combinacion estrecha con el movimiento para obtener el titulo del distrito ejemplar en la educacion.
					
					A base del estudio y analisis correctos sobre la situacion actual de la educacion de nuestro pais y la tendencia mundial del desarrollo de la rama, las instituciones docentes y de investigacion cientifica deben fortalecer la investigacion para elevar la calidad de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos, sistematizar y generalizar de manera cientifico-teorica los nuevos y sobresalientes metodos didacticos y las experiencias de educacion que se crean en la realidad. 
					
					Por ultimo, el informante llamo a dinamizar la labor para implantar exitosamente la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos en acto al noble amor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un por las generaciones venideras y el futuro.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda liquidacion del pasado criminal de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda liquidacion del pasado criminal de Japon
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que para mejorar las relaciones Corea-Japon es necesario liquidar primero los crimenes del pasado cometidos por Japon contra el pueblo coreano, y continua:
					Los politiqueros japoneses difunden la opinion publica como si no se mejoraran las relaciones con Corea por culpa de esta diciendo que debe ser resuelto el "problema fundamental" para llevar adelante las conversaciones entre ambos paises.
					
					Esto es la logica bandidesca que la injusticia critica la justicia.
					
					La historia reconoce que Japon ocupo con las fuerzas armadas la Corea, Estado soberano, y aplico el dominio colonial sin precedente.
					
					En este periodo el imperialismo japones perpetro los crimenes nunca vistos en la historia y son incontables las perdidas espirituales, morales, humanas y materiales del pueblo coreano.
					
					En el periodo de la ocupacion de Corea, el imperialismo japones arresto y secuestro forzosamente a mas de 8 millones 400 mil coreanos para utilizarlos como carnes de canones de guerra o imponerles el trabajo forzado como bestiales, asesino sin piedad a mas de un millon y convirtio a mas de 200 mil mujeres coreanas en las esclavas sexuales de su viejo ejercito. 
					
					En el caso de cometer el crimen hay que reconocerlo y liquidarlo. Esto es la etica y moralidad y la demanda legal y la costumbre.
					
					A pesar de esto, Japon evade la disculpa y la indemnizacion por sus crimenes del pasado sin reconocer nada por el respecto.
					
					En el mundo hay muchos paises y naciones que cometieron con intenciones o sin querer las faltas. Pero, solo Japon elude obstinadamente la reflexion y la disculpa por sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado.
					
					Es mejor para si mismo que Japon liquide sin demora sus crimenes del pasado.
